text: Does anyone have a workflow for academic citations with Franklin yet?

elements.text: Does anyone have a workflow for academic citations with Franklin yet?

text: Actually, I think I just like writing in latex, so I will use pandoc to convert before posting things

text: I hacked something for my page using a yank file for my references; what’s missing is a good bibtex renderer; so latex and Pandoc is currently the best way to go think

text:
While I have you: I have the following

```pandoc -s tex_template.tex --filter pandoc-citeproc -o output.md --to=markdown-citations --wrap=none```
